Html:
I've just downloaded the KiGG solution and when I try to run it I get "Story does not exists" exception in StoryController Detail action. It's trying to find a story with the name "default.aspx".

I'm running Win 2003, SQL Server 2008 Dev, VS 2008, ASP.NET MVC RC. Using Visual Studio Web Server for KiGG.
Reading some other posts I fixed the issue by deleting the Default.aspx.
